summary:
Result-oriented certified PMP, Philip's certified expert Project Manager, practitioner in MSP (Managing Successful Programmes) and PRINCE2, certified Agile ScrumMaster with 18 years of experience in  Programme and Project Management, PMO for large transformation initiatives and consulting, including consecutive 4 years in ERP SAP environment. For 14 years working in The Netherlands. 

With Philips, he is leading planning, dependency, change control and scope areas within Business Transformation PMO team. He is also playing a pivotal role in setting-up PMO offshore model. He has worked for organisations like Deloitte consulting, ING, Shell, Dutch Central bank (DNB), CRH plc, ADM, Liberty Global, Imperial Tobacco, Transco, BP and Wipro consulting. 

As part of Deloitte consulting, he worked with various clients in management advisory and implementation role. Additionally, worked as Project Management trainer and Value Proposition/practice Lead for PMO and also involved in building the new offering with analytics team on portfolio reporting via iPad. 

Prior, worked with Wipro for nearly 10 years in multiple roles within SAP and Consulting where he successfully delivered multi-million euro projects/programme within tolerance, resolved key operational issues, effectively managed vendors and ensured service delivery within service level agreed with customers in compliance with CMMi and implemented LEAN as well.

He is dutch language level A2 certified with speaking capability at intermediate level.

MS in Software Engineering from BITS, India and Leadership course from RSM, NL with certifications in ITIL, P3O, PMO & COBIT. Trained on LEAN Leadership as practitioner with Philips. 

Accredited with the FIMC (Feather in My Cap) award two times and published White Paper on “IT Cost Management in Banking: A Pragmatic Approach”

He is also board member of PMI Netherlands Chapter for last 5 years, currently serving as Director of Events.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

profile_positions.description: Leading and establishing Portfolio Management for HR globally. As an integral member of HR Strategy team, defining HR Strategy and decision making on Investment and thus Prioritization. Contributing to the establishment of a common set of practices, tools and templates for portfolio, program, and project-level management and ensure standards are being followed.
profile_positions.title: Global HR Portfolio Leader

profile_positions.description: Leading the HR PM pool of 20+ Project and Program Managers placed in the Netherlands, Poland, India, UK and US working for various global HR transformations. My role is to ensure the impact being generated by the programs as expected in addition to the Team Management – capacity planning and forecasting, performance cycle and to develop the necessary capabilities within the team. Keeping the aspirations of the team member and ensuring the Trustable environment is the Key for me to lead this team effectively.
profile_positions.title: Head of HR Projects and Transformation (a.i)

profile_positions.description: As PMO for HR International Markets, drove transformation initiatives supporting HR Business Partners for 15 international markets (global excluding North America and China) and central HR function. Led structured Program Mgmt. for initiatives like Headcount Dashboard, Future of Work & other transformations. Establishing Community of Practices across 15 markets for delivering global/ local initiatives based on the priorities, focusing cross-teams learnings. Playing role in Hiring control and monitoring Annual Operating plan.
profile_positions.title: Director PMO HR International Markets, Marketing & Digital

profile_positions.description: As a Director with Business Transformation PMO, leading planning for all PIO global Programs. Establish standards for planning including dependency management and change control. Responsible to build team and lead planners to develop planning capability within the transformation organization. In addition, coach and trainer for PMs and PMOs on program/project planning area.
profile_positions.title: Director Business Transformation PMO (Portfolio Management Office)

profile_positions.description:
Vikram Srivastava led the planning, dependency, change control and scope areas within Business Transformation PMO team. He set-up the benefits tracking process across portfolios in his first year starting Philips from dec 2014-dec 2015. He played pivotal role in establishing initial PMO standards and dashboards for management team. In addition, as a PMP trainer, he conducted training to Healthcare PMs supported with real-time examples. He is known for his result oriented attitude and his multi tasking skills within the team. 

Philips certified him as Expert in Project Management and trained on LEAN leadership course as practitioner.
profile_positions.title: PMO Lead

profile_positions.description:
As a PMI Netherlands Chapter Board member, leading Events volunteers’ team - responsible for shaping the chapter vision into reality by ensuring the successful execution of Chapter's Events. This position plays a critical role in bringing together people with various expertise together and providing value to the members of the Dutch chapter. As a host, speaker or even as a member, this role provides me opportunity to share my management expertise & learnings at the same time provides me platform to learn from others. As a mentor with the chapter, guided two mentees and received positive and encouraging feedback.

If you have any query or interested to know more about PMI Netherlands or Events team, connect with me here https://pmi-nl.nl/board-members
profile_positions.title: Board Member PMI Netherlands for Events (Volunteer Position)

profile_positions.description:
PMI Netherlands Chapter - Dutch Chapter Board member and representative to the world's largest International Project Management community, PMI.

Key responsibilities:
- Develop and implement communication and marketing operational strategies
- Lead and develop the team responsible for building, maintaining and increasing the engagement of existing and prospective members
- Increase awareness of the Chapter and its offerings
- Develop and enhance the local PMI Dutch Chapter brand
- Editor-in-Chief and publisher of PMI Dutch Chapter Newsletter
- Responsible for maintaining an up-to-date chapter website and social networks
- Manage the design, content, and production of promotional materials
profile_positions.title: Director for Communications and Marketing - Board member PMI NL

profile_positions.description:
Joined Deloitte Consulting in Netherlands as Senior Consultant from 1st Jan'2013
Project Management trainer and Value Proposition/practice Lead for PMO 
Involved in New service, iPL: fact-based insight for Project Portfolio Performance anytime anywhere

Jan'2013: Started PMO consulting for Consumer Business client at Imperial Tobacco Group (ITG) with advice on the governance model for the CRM transformation programme and supported the set-up of the programme.

Feb'2013: Moved to Telecommunication client at Liberty Global International and performed gap analysis on the Governance Approval process and delivered report with recommendations to simplify the process.

Mar'2013 - Oct'2013: Delivered value to agricultural processor, ADM in re-branding of the PMO, Project and sub-projects planning with extensive use of MS project plan, increased visibility by publishing Gantt chart, introduced and implemented Earned Value management reports.

Nov'2013 - Jan'2014: Moved to Health industry with the transformation programme on merger of 2 hospitals, Atrium & Orbis hospital, where I set-up the Project Management tooling for multiple SAP projects following Deloitte's Enterprise Value Delivery methodology. Also set-up the financials, Risk & Issue management process and status reporting for the programme which was well appreciated.

Feb'2014: Helped CRH, largest Irish company in building materials in setting -up financials and Earned Value Management for one of the big European transformation programme.

Mar'2014-Apr'14: Back to Banking environment with DNB (Dutch Central Bank) this time for PMO and Project coordination for the Asset Quality Review / Risk Audit initiative.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Working with WIPRO Technologies since Apr’2003 for different customers in diverse roles varying from SAP technical role to consulting role.

Noteworthy Attainments:
* Demonstrated skills in setting-up the Contracting and Resourcing processes for the CoEBIS department
* Instrumental in improving the existing way of reporting to senior management including Agile Scrum Projects
* Assessed the portfolio of all business projects and performed Project Management Health check
* Managing dependencies and rendering support in analyzing the portfolio of 33+ projects
* Designed and managing Resource Tracker for the complex requirements of the department 
* Defined the key financial reports by analyzing the financial structure of the department
* Guiding  Solution Delivery Managers on reporting and managing projects
* Prepared the PMO Service Catalogue for setting-up the PMO for the department
* Received appreciation by Portfolio Manager on the improvements achieved in the reporting area
* Received appreciation by department manager for playing the additional role of Solution Delivery Manager
profile_positions.title: Business Support Manager (For ING)

profile_positions.description:
Noteworthy Attainments:
* Successfully accomplished 2010-11 multi-million euro projects and delivered key sub-projects from the list of 17 sub-projects
* Received appreciation by the customer on the review done on vendor’s payment structure and for streamlining the process of approval for the deliverables delivered
* Oversaw all the sub-projects / packages within the project and helped the senior management in close monitoring and tracking of project’s budget and efforts
* Executed biweekly technical package owners meeting which improved the quality of reporting to senior management
* Interfaced with other departments and served as a catalyst in the resource allocation process.
* Led the project from the front in scoring 95% in the Process Assurance review which was very critical for the Executives to attain
* Reduced the duration of process assurance review through Project’s “Document Index” which became a re-usable document for another project
* Received appreciation by all stakeholders for being the part of the video published on client’s intranet discussing the re-organization and its impact on employees with the CTO of the customer’s organization
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Manager and PMO Consultant (For ING)

profile_positions.description:
Noteworthy Attainments:
* Successfully accomplished 2009-10 multi-million euro transformation projects on-schedule in March’2010
* Defined performance metrics for the projects and then mapped these metrics with programme’s objectives and department’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
* Prepared and analyzed the resource utilization vs. resource allocation report that helped the department to improve its productivity
* Was the core member of the “Think-Tank” team which led the alignment initiative between the transformation change projects and the baseline organization
* Pointed out couple of weak points in initial vendor’s contract which saved loss for the customer
* Wrote a white paper titled "IT Cost Management in Banking: A Pragmatic Approach" and received the first prize in the organization level at White Paper contest
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Manager and PMO Consultant (For ING)

profile_positions.description:
Noteworthy Attainments:
* Successfully completed, within programme tolerance, five 2008-09 transformation projects and helped in closing fourteen audit points within allocated budget
* Re-structured the programme by introducing client’s Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for each project for effective vendor management
* Introduced “Payments as per delivery” mechanism in dealing with vendors which proved to be very beneficial for the customer
* Appreciated by customer for the first successful resource match via the governance tool “Clarity” and developed the process flow to manage the resource demand and supply for resource matching office (RMO)
* Received appreciation from customer on analysis made for a critical situation which decided the “Must Have” solution over “Nice to Have” option
* Prepared management document on justification of budget allocation for 2009-10 projects and received appreciation
profile_positions.title: Programme Manager (For ING)

profile_positions.description:
* Received appreciation for planning levels by all levels of stakeholders
* Played pivotal in defining the PMO service catalog for the customer
* Prepared projects to meet CMMi level two key requirements and project’s configuration management plan was published on customer’s intranet as one of the best sample
profile_positions.title: PMO Consultant (For ING)

profile_positions.description:
Noteworthy Attainments:
* Streamlined various processes specifically the on-boarding and off-boarding process which reduced on-boarding cycle time from twelve days to seven days for the eighty members’ team
* Functioned as a reporting focal point, analyzed various reports using COGNOS reporting tool which helped the project to reach the agreed SLA with the client, consistently for one and a half years
* Designed SAP based tool “EEAT” (Effort Estimation and Analyzer Tool) for effort planning and estimation considering different types of deliverables and resource levels using the Work Breakdown Structure approach
* Accredited with the award of FIMC (Feather in My Cap) from Wipro to lead team that made customer SOX compliant
profile_positions.title: Quality Coordinator and Module Lead (For Shell)

profile_positions.description:
* Significantly set-up the quality process and prepared the quality approach document, technical specification checklist, code checklist, technical test cases in UTP
* Implemented Lean Management principles in two SAP projects with acceptance from Software Engineering Process Group (SEPG) of Wipro
* Appreciated by customer for the implementation of Excel based Defect Tracking tool in the project
* Accredited with the award of FIMC (Feather in My Cap) from Wipro for ensuring quality deliverables to the client
profile_positions.title: Quality Coordinator (For Shell)

profile_positions.description:
Noteworthy Attainments:
* Prepared technical specifications, development and testing of SAP objects; developed SAP scripts, Active List Viewer (ALV) reports and Interfaces
* Prepared presentations on SAP performance tools “Code Inspector” and on CATT (Computer Aided Testing Tool), both uploaded to organization’s knowledge repository
* Mentored the new team members and led the module for 6 months
profile_positions.title: SAP Consultant (For BP and Transco)
